name:
nintendogs™ + cats:
French Bulldog
formal_name: nintendogs™ + cats: French Bulldog and New Friends
description: The fun from the original nintendogs game returns with multiple breeds to choose from, accessories for your puppies and kittens to wear, and the ability to let your puppies and kittens train and compete in different challenges and activities. Puppies and kittens come to life as they react to your touch and voice. Share pictures, gifts and daily activities with other players using StreetPass. You can also download new game content, such as new Mii characters and items, via SpotPass. With more than 20 breeds to choose from, each puppy and kitten has unique coloring and personality possibilities. In this version, you can choose the French Bulldog as a first pick!
disclaimer:
Due to the size of this game, it may take longer to download the digital version of this title when compared to other Nintendo eShop games. At the time of purchase you can choose either “Download Now” to begin to download the game immediately or “Download Later” to download the game when the system enters “sleep mode.”

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

A demo of nintendogs+cats can be downloaded from the title information page for the Golden Retriever & New Friends version of the game. In the demo, you can choose to play with dogs from all three versions of nintendogs+cats (golden retriever, toy poodle, and French bulldog).

Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.

Wireless broadband Internet access required for online features. For more information, go to support.nintendo.com.
